data.title: Physical Touching during Greetings and Goodbyes
data.details: Male-Male greeting #1-#25: Handshake. Male-Male goodbye #1-#25: Handshake. Male-Male greeting or goodbye #25+: Right hand clasp + one armed hug. Male-Female greeting #1: Handshake. Male-Female goodbye #1: Hug. Male-Female greeing or goodbye #1+: Hug.
